options.content:
AWS Cost - Focus Dashboard

Section Overview
This dashboard is currently in development and should be considered beta. The visuals in this dashboard present cost and usage trends for the entire management payer or based on account and region selections. All queries in this dashboard are based on the FinOps.org FOCUS specification.

panels.description: This sections includes visuals for the entire management account and all linked accounts.

options.content: This sections includes visuals for the entire management account and all linked accounts.

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('${CURGranularity}', chargeperiodstart) as chargeperiodstart,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) AS TotalEffectiveCost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
GROUP BY
    1
ORDER BY chargeperiodstart

SELECT
    servicename,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) as TotalEffectiveCost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
GROUP BY
    1
ORDER BY TotalEffectiveCost DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
    servicecategory,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) AS TotalEffectiveCost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
GROUP BY
    1
ORDER BY TotalEffectiveCost DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT
    subaccountname,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) AS TotalEffectiveCost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
GROUP BY
    1
ORDER BY TotalEffectiveCost DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT
    regionname,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) AS TotalEffectiveCost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
GROUP BY
    1
ORDER BY TotalEffectiveCost DESC
LIMIT 20;

panels.description: Calculate unit-cost metrics (e.g., cost per GB of storage) to expose cost density and target optimizations that lower overall spend.

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('${CURGranularity}', ChargePeriodStart) as ChargePeriodStart,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) / NULLIF(SUM(CAST(ConsumedQuantity AS DECIMAL(10, 2))), 0) AS CostPerGB
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
    AND ChargeDescription LIKE '%transfer%'
    AND ConsumedUnit = 'GB'
GROUP BY
    1

panels.title: Cost per GB of storage

panels.description: This sections includes visuals for the entire the account and region selections.  Account ID: $AccountId Region: $Region

options.content: This sections includes visuals for the entire the account and region selections.  Account ID: $AccountId Region: $Region

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('${CURGranularity}', chargeperiodstart) as chargeperiodstart,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) AS TotalEffectiveCost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
    AND subaccountid = '$AccountId'
    AND regionid = '$Region'
GROUP BY
    1
ORDER BY chargeperiodstart

SELECT
    servicename,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) as TotalEffectiveCost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
    AND subaccountid = '$AccountId'
    AND regionid = '$Region'
GROUP BY
    1
ORDER BY TotalEffectiveCost DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
    subaccountname,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) AS TotalEffectiveCost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
    AND subaccountid = '$AccountId'
    AND regionid = '$Region'
GROUP BY
    1
ORDER BY TotalEffectiveCost DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
    servicecategory,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) AS TotalEffectiveCost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
    AND subaccountid = '$AccountId'
    AND regionid = '$Region'
GROUP BY
    1
ORDER BY TotalEffectiveCost DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT
    regionname,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) AS TotalEffectiveCost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
    AND subaccountid = '$AccountId'
    AND regionid = '$Region'
GROUP BY
    1
ORDER BY TotalEffectiveCost DESC
LIMIT 20;

panels.description: Calculate unit-cost metrics (e.g., cost per GB of storage) to expose cost density and target optimizations that lower overall spend.

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('${CURGranularity}', ChargePeriodStart) as ChargePeriodStart,
    SUM(EffectiveCost) / NULLIF(SUM(CAST(ConsumedQuantity AS DECIMAL(10, 2))), 0) AS CostPerGB
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
    AND ChargeDescription LIKE '%transfer%'
    AND ConsumedUnit = 'GB'
    AND subaccountid = '$AccountId'
    AND regionid = '$Region'
GROUP BY
    1

panels.title: Cost per GB of storage: $AccountId - $Region

list.description: Athena CUR Table connection for queries to AWS Cost and Usage
list.label: CUR Datasource
list.name: CURDatasource

list.description: CloudWatch Datasource, for queries to metrics and logs
list.label: CW Datasource
list.name: CWDatasource

list.description: CUR Table name; change if not cur2
list.label: CUR Table
list.name: CURTable

list.description: All account IDs found in the CUR for look back period.
list.label: Account ID
list.name: AccountId

list.description: Regions observed in the CUR over the look back period
list.label: Region
list.name: Region

query.rawSQL:
SELECT 
DISTINCT regionid,
CASE 
    WHEN regionid = 'us-east-1' THEN 0
    ELSE 1
END AS sort_order
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
$__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
AND subaccountid = '${AccountId}'
AND regionid != ''
ORDER BY
sort_order,
regionid

list.description: Select the Granularity for CUR data points
list.label: CUR Granularity
list.name: CURGranularity

list.description:
Select the Granularity for CloudWatch data points in seconds.  

300 = 5 minutes, 3600 = 1 hour, 86400 = 1 day, 604800 = 1 week, 2592000 = 1 month
list.label: CloudWatch Granularity(s)
list.name: CWGranularity

list.description: Tag Key extracted from CUR and observed in the time period selected.
list.label: Tag Key
list.name: TagKey

query.rawSQL:
WITH all_keys AS (
  SELECT ARRAY_DISTINCT(ARRAY_AGG(key)) AS unique_keys
  FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
  CROSS JOIN UNNEST(MAP_KEYS(tags)) AS t(key)
  WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
  AND subaccountid = '${AccountId}'
  AND regionid = '${Region}'
)

SELECT key AS unique_key
FROM all_keys
CROSS JOIN UNNEST(unique_keys) AS t(key);

SELECT 
  tags['${TagKey}'] AS tag_value,
  COUNT(*) AS count
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(ChargePeriodStart)
  AND subaccountid = '${AccountId}'
  AND regionid = '${Region}'
  AND tags['${TagKey}'] IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY tags['${TagKey}']
ORDER BY count DESC;
